snippet.title: DOOM INFINITE - Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
DOOM INFINITE is a singleplayer roguelike action FPS based on the original Doom and Doom II.

Lost in Infinity's grasp, the Doom Slayer must break an endless cycle of death and rebirth. Take a plunge into the twisted spiral of never-ending death and bloodlust, discover dark secrets, take advantage of mysterious powerups, mod your guns to your liking,  browse the shop for the perfect summer shirt!

Demo version - featuring the Classic Mode - is available now on moddb and Discord! Slay with us, it's fun!

For some reason it works on Delta Touch as well - be sure to enable Touch Input in Doom Infinite's Input Options!

---
DOWNLOAD: https://www.moddb.com/mods/doom-infinite/downloads/doom-infinite-demo-09785

DOOM Infinite on mod.db: https://www.moddb.com/mods/doom-infinite

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/doominfinite

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/EfPZhxkRpA

Music: DOOM: E1M1 (At Doom's Gate) - Metal Cover - RichaadEB & ToxicxEternity
